column5: Unfortunately I wouldn't personally know, my PB is still a paltry 46 incher

Well its been a great year of fishing for my buddy John. In June I managed to get him onto his PB stream brook trout    Then two weeks ago while on Sparrow he gets his PB largemouth    This weekend he was able to get up to the Sudbury chapter of Musky's Canada outing while I had to stay at home in  the K=Dub. He gets his PB musky. Out of a 4-5 ft weed flat on the West Arm. She came on a Chartruese Bucktail with a silver blade and measured in at a glorious 49.5" x 23". I hope to still get in the 50 inch club before he does.     Now its my turn Johnnyboy.
Well don't let him make a monkey out of you!
What a fat pig!
Yup, them some nice fish...
All nice fish but that brookie is one heck of a nice stream fish. Congrats to your Bud.
Congrats on the PBs.  Great healthy looking musky  just JOHN
What a season!!! All great fish but that muskie is icing on the cake. What a PIGGY!!! Congrats and thanks for the report.  Cheers, 1leg
Now that's a great season, so far....    Have to agree with Roy on the speckie, sweet fish!  Congrats to John!!
Very nice!! That brookie looks sweet and that Musky is a monster!! Thanks for sharing.
Nice fish, and an awesome musky. WTG!!!
Wow.  I wish my year was half as good.  That's a nice shovelhead on that ski.  Amazng brookie as well.
Congratulation to your buddy for his PBs  Those are real fat and chunky! Thanks for sharing Leechman
That musky is very impressive indeed and congrats to your bud on the PB !!  I'll be on the West Arm next week and hopefully that big girl will still be in a feeding mood
That musky is very impressive indeed and congrats to your bud on the PB !!  I'll be on the West Arm next week and hopefully that big girl will still be in a feeding mood
awesome
HA HA HA..Ya made Lew studder.....................
Hey Andy, a fish like that should make any musky nut studder
Great catches!!  Please tell your friend congratulations for me!   Think he is still smiling about that musky?
He'll still be smiling next year!!!
Very nice fish indeed, my favorite is that big largemouth bass. Did you get to weigh it?
Apparantly this is the year of the BIG musky on OFC. Awesome fish, congrat's to your bud!
Wow, she has some serious girth already, nice fish.
WOW...3 personal bests all in a very short time !!!.  ..congrats to him for sure,  well done...cheers
Congrats to your buddy! Seems to be a big differece between fish in the mid 40" range compared to 50 inch fish. Those near 50 inch fish become girthy tanks.
Wow, awesome specimen of a Muskellunge!!!
